title: data currents
extract: Current is the flow of electrical charge carriers like electrons. ... One ampere of current is defined as one coulomb of electrical charge moving past a unique point in a second. Electric current is widely used in household and industrial appliances.
extract_html: Current is the flow of electrical charge carriers like electrons. ... One ampere of current is defined as one coulomb of electrical charge moving past a unique point in a second. Electric current is widely used in household and industrial appliances.
